channel.title: Community Pulse
channel.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
channel.itunes:summary: Community Builders Mary Thengvall, Jason Hand, and PJ Hagerty interview experts in the field of Community Leadership and Management on a broad range of topics related to building community.
channel.description: Community Builders Mary Thengvall, Jason Hand, and PJ Hagerty interview experts in the field of Community Leadership and Management on a broad range of topics related to building community.

item.title: Travel Tips - Community Pulse Episode 12
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Mary and PJ get together with [Jason Yee](http://twitter.com/gitbisect), [Davey Shafik](http://twitter.com/dshafik), and [David Blank-Edelman](http://twitter.com/otterbook) to talk travel tips, packing ideas, and what you can't live without on a plane.
item.description: Mary and PJ get together with [Jason Yee](http://twitter.com/gitbisect), [Davey Shafik](http://twitter.com/dshafik), and [David Blank-Edelman](http://twitter.com/otterbook) to talk travel tips, packing ideas, and what you can't live without on a plane.

item.title: Burnout - Part Two - Community Pulse Episode 11
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: The return of guests Jessica Fish and John Willis to discuss recognizing burnout and dealing with it. Hosted by Mary Thengvall, Jason Hand, and PJ Hagerty.
item.description: The return of guests Jessica Fish and John Willis to discuss recognizing burnout and dealing with it. Hosted by Mary Thengvall, Jason Hand, and PJ Hagerty.

item.title: Burnout - Part One - Community Pulse Episode 10
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Your hosts Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, and PJ Hagerty in conversation with guests Jessica Fish and John Willis on the topic of burnout in the DevRel community.
item.description: Your hosts Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, and PJ Hagerty in conversation with guests Jessica Fish and John Willis on the topic of burnout in the DevRel community.

item.title: Balancing Your Public And Private Lives - Community Pulse Episode 09
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: In this Halloween-ish episode of Community Pulse, PJ and Mary talk to [Coraline Ada Ehmke](https://twitter.com/CoralineAda) and [Ed Finkler](https://twitter.com/funkatron). We explore the the two sides of the same coin that are the life of technical advocates.
item.description: In this Halloween-ish episode of Community Pulse, PJ and Mary talk to [Coraline Ada Ehmke](https://twitter.com/CoralineAda) and [Ed Finkler](https://twitter.com/funkatron). We explore the the two sides of the same coin that are the life of technical advocates.

item.title: Jono Bacon: Father Of Community - Community Pulse Episode 02
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Jason and Mary talk to Jono Bacon about the difference between 'read' and 'write' communities, how difficult (and important!) it is for us to define our role, how to deal with our harshest critics, and more.
item.description: Jason and Mary talk to Jono Bacon about the difference between 'read' and 'write' communities, how difficult (and important!) it is for us to define our role, how to deal with our harshest critics, and more.

item.title: Intrducing PJ - Community Pulse Episode 08
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: The one where we introduce [PJ Hagerty](https://twitter.com/aspleenic), the new guy.
item.description: The one where we introduce [PJ Hagerty](https://twitter.com/aspleenic), the new guy.

item.title: #DevRelsFTW - Community Pulse Episode 06
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: [Jason Yee](https://twitter.com/gitbisect), [PJ Hagerty](https://twiter.com/aspleenic), and [Carina C. Zona](https://twitter.com/cczona) join us to talk through some of the prevalent struggles in community management. Trust us -- you'll simply want to listen.
item.description: [Jason Yee](https://twitter.com/gitbisect), [PJ Hagerty](https://twiter.com/aspleenic), and [Carina C. Zona](https://twitter.com/cczona) join us to talk through some of the prevalent struggles in community management. Trust us -- you'll simply want to listen.

item.title: Making The Jump From One To Many - Community Pulse Episode 07
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of Community Pulse we were joined by [Nathen Harvey](https://twitter.com/nathenharvey) (VP of Community Development, Chef) and [Phil Leggetter](https://twitter.com/leggetter) (Head of Developer Relations, Nexmo) to talk about learning to scale a community role.
item.description: In this episode of Community Pulse we were joined by [Nathen Harvey](https://twitter.com/nathenharvey) (VP of Community Development, Chef) and [Phil Leggetter](https://twitter.com/leggetter) (Head of Developer Relations, Nexmo) to talk about learning to scale a community role.

item.title: The Community For Community Professionals - Community Pulse Episode 05
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: [CMX](http://cmxhub.com/) is the community for community professionals. We talk to [David Spinks](https://twitter.com/davidspinks) and [Carrie Jones](https://twitter.com/caremjo) about the future of community professionals.
item.description: [CMX](http://cmxhub.com/) is the community for community professionals. We talk to [David Spinks](https://twitter.com/davidspinks) and [Carrie Jones](https://twitter.com/caremjo) about the future of community professionals.

item.title: Metrics: Arch Nemesis Of The Community Builder - Community Pulse Episode 04
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Metrics tend to be the community builder's arch nemesis. In this episode, Jason and Mary sit down with community folks from Keen and Bitergia.
item.description: Metrics tend to be the community builder's arch nemesis. In this episode, Jason and Mary sit down with community folks from Keen and Bitergia.

item.title: Andrew Hyde: Pursue Your Passions - Community Pulse Episode 03
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Community builder and organizer [Andrew Hyde](http://twitter.com/andrewhyde) talks about how to pursue your passions in this episode of Community Pulse.
item.description: Community builder and organizer [Andrew Hyde](http://twitter.com/andrewhyde) talks about how to pursue your passions in this episode of Community Pulse.

item.title: Meet The Hosts - Community Pulse Episode 01
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Get to know the hosts of the new Community Pulse podcast: [Jason Hand](http://twitter.com/jasonhand) and [Mary Thengvall](http://twitter.com/mary_grace).
item.description: Get to know the hosts of the new Community Pulse podcast: [Jason Hand](http://twitter.com/jasonhand) and [Mary Thengvall](http://twitter.com/mary_grace).

item.title: - Community Pulse Episode 13
item.itunes:author: Jason Hand, Mary Thengvall, PJ Hagerty
item.itunes:summary: Mary, Jason, and PJ sit down with [Ken Mugrage](http://twitter.com/kmugrage) and [Matthew Broberg](http://twitter.com/mjbrender) to talk about how to plan for a new year.
item.description: Mary, Jason, and PJ sit down with [Ken Mugrage](http://twitter.com/kmugrage) and [Matthew Broberg](http://twitter.com/mjbrender) to talk about how to plan for a new year.
